tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_training_completion_records (
  employee_id INT,
  training_module_name VARCHAR,
  completion_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)
CREATE TABLE employee (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50), hire_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE training (training_id INT PRIMARY KEY, training_name VARCHAR(50), completion_date DATE, passed BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE employee_training (employee_id INT, training_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee(employee_id),FOREIGN KEY (training_id) REFERENCES training(training_id));

CREATE TABLE employee_training (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES training_courses(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    record_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);
